data.eml:eml: Indolestes lafaeci sp. nov. (Odonata: Lestidae) from Timor, with comparisons to related species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seehausen, Malte (2017): Indolestes lafaeci sp. nov. (Odonata: Lestidae) from Timor, with comparisons to related species. Zootaxa 4244 (1): 79-90, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4244.1.4
